name: ORD_ASMT_RMNDR_LTR
description: This table contains information about the reminder letters sent for a given mammography assessment.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the reminder letter.

columns.name: MAMM_RMD_LTR_DT
columns.description: Dates on which a reminder letter was sent to have an appointment scheduled for regular mammograms

columns.name: MAMMO_LETTER_ID
columns.description: The record ID of the mammo reminder letter. This would be commonly used to link to the actual letter text.
